QuestData.Title: Picking Up the Pieces... Literally
QuestData.Description:
Orbs help us develop terrain for the Forge. Magic within the orbs draws the devourers. They tear apart the metal to reach it. We must collect the remains.
Look for the fragments around the orbs. Bring them to us.
QuestData.RewardText: Enough to fix a small orb. This will do.
